doc:
Charla Doherty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charla_Doherty 0 Charla Doherty (August 6, 1946 – May 29, 1988) was an American actress who had short-term roles on Wagon Train and Dr. Kildare before originating the role of Julie Olson on the soap opera Days of Our Lives. Doherty played the role from 1965 until she left the series in 1967.She played the role of Melinda Neilson in the 1963 season of Leave It to Beaver in the episode Don Juan Beaver. She played the role of Nancy in the 1965 movie Village of the Giants. She played the role of Joanna Ramsey in the 1967 made-for-television movie In the Year 2889. She also directed and starred in local theater productions and was active in a non-profit group that fed the homeless. Charla_Doherty ( August_6_,_1946 – May_29_,_1988 ) was an_American_actress who had short-term_roles on Wagon_Train and Dr._Kildare before originating the_role of Julie_Olson on the_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives . Doherty played the_role from 1965 until she left the_series in 1967 . She played the_role of Melinda_Neilson in the_1963_season of Leave_It to Beaver in the_episode_Don_Juan_Beaver . She played the_role of Nancy in the_1965_movie_Village of the_Giants . She played the_role of Joanna_Ramsey in the_1967_made-for-television_movie In the_Year_2889 . She also directed and starred in local_theater_productions and was active in a_non-profit_group that fed the_homeless .
